data.comment: The big names in today's match at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 5, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
In the minute 7, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yairo Moreno for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 8, Oscar Macias Romo awards San Luis a goal kick.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 9, Oscar Macias Romo signals a throw-in for Leon, close to San Luis's area.
Goal kick for Leon at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Free kick for Leon in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 12, Emanuel Gigliotti for Leon drives towards goal at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 15, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a San Luis throw-in in Leon's half.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 17, Leon have a goal kick.
Attention is being given to San Luisâ€™s Luis Leon and play has been suspended briefly.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 20, Leon take a 0-1 lead thanks to Angel Mena.
Luis Montes instrumental with a fine assist.
Guillermo Vazquez (San Luis) is making a first change, with Jorge Sanchez replacing the possibly injured Luis Leon.
In the minute 23, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 27, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Ramiro Gonzalez of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Leon at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In San Luis de Potosi San Luis attack through Jorge Sanchez. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 31, Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 33, San Luis's German Berterame breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Leon a goal kick.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Throw-in Leon.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
San Luis's Juan Castro has been booked in San Luis de Potosi.
Free kick for Leon in the half of San Luis.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Leon to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Leon are in shooting range from this free kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Oscar Macias Romo blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Leon.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ramiro Gonzalez (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
Oscar Macias Romo awards San Luis a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, Ramiro Gonzalez has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 57, Can Leon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Leon's Nicolas Sosa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Rodrigo Noya is on a sub for Juan Castro for San Luis.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Yairo Moreno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 64, Leon's Yairo Moreno looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 66, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Jean Meneses is replacing David Ramirez for the away team.
The away team replace Emanuel Gigliotti with Joel Campbell.
In the minute 69, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Leon just outside San Luis's area.
Leon are pushing forward but Joel Campbell's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 70, San Luis make their third substitution with Enrique Lopez replacing Camilo Mayada.
San Luis make their fourth substitution with Felipe Gallegos replacing Pablo Barrera.
It's now 0-2 in San Luis de Potosi as Jean Meneses scores for Leon.
In the minute 72, Diego Pineda is replacing Mauro Quiroga for the home team.
Free kick for Leon in the half of San Luis.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nicolas Sosa.
In the minute 78, Jose Rodriguez is on a sub for Pedro Aquino for Leon.
Osvaldo Rodriguez is replacing Yairo Moreno for Leon at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Nicolas Sosa (Leon) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Armando Leon.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Leon.
Free kick Leon.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leon have a goal kick.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
